description:
Mountain-ready socks for women who shred. Fine-gauge merino wool provides warmth without bulk and has natural antimicrobial properties.

  • Made of high-density knit merino wool with nylon and spandex for durability and fit
  • True seamless construction makes them irresistibly comfortable
  • High-density cushioning underfoot and on the shin for comfort in ski boots
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Yeti Midweight with Cushion OTC Socks - Women's
